content.detailedDescription:
It was a small red spot moving south from where we were. it would change to a smaller black dot. it would zig zag up and down side to side we knew it was not a plane from the airport by the way it moved. i was about 6 but remember it like it was yesterday.We was driving home from my gradmothers, she lived on gibbon road,we were on our way home and had just turned on to upton road when we seen it.This took place in central point ore. i was a little scared for i was so young at the time. 


 this was just the first of many i have seen through my life here in ore. i seen one while was in high school. 6 of us went out to the river at gold rey dam, 3 of us seen it and 3 did not. it was the biggest one i have seen to date. it had a u shaped top with a flat bottem it was so big it looked like a large building in the sky, it looked 40 storys high. like a big buiding in the city the front had some light on and some off, it also had 2 flood light in the front and1 in the back shining on the ground moving all around like it was looking for something on the ground. we have 2 large rock formations here in the rogue valley called table rock. one is lager then the other. this craft came right over the top of the big one and was as big as the top of table rock, i wasent scared more excited.

 i had one track me to the end of the road( canes creek)on to old stage. it was 10:30 and there was no help in sight. i leaned forward and it was right over my car mybe 25 feet up i was scared it joined 2 other and they all went over the mountin. 

i had one come off the trees right in front of my car my daughter was with me this time

i also seen one shift change from a large disk to a small black triangle. call for more info, its just to hard to explane on the computer. i have also made drawings. i dont know if they took me on to there ships they could have. i dont remember it if they did. i know they are there,there is no way to explan other then i have seen many ufo,s. thank you leanna
content.summary: This was the first of many i have seen here in ore. it was a red circle that move sidwways up and downit would turn to asmallblack dot then would come back to the red dot. my mother was driving and my older brother was in the back seat watching it too.

content.detailedDescription:
I have seen many ufos in the past year and i had just posted my accounts here on mufon a couple of days ago (5/30/08). not even a week later (monday june 01, 2008), i witnessed the most alien craft in 1 day.

9:30 driving with my buddy lucas to go pick someone up. i see a floating light descending from the sky ahead to the north as i have seen ufos do before. i was a little wary but continued driving.

9:40 as we were arriving to justin's house, i look to the north again and see 6-7 flashing and glowing light descending from the sky like earlier. they move behind the trees as we arrived at justin's house. we leave with justin heading west towards the gulf of mexico. 

9:45 we turn north onto a street that runs along side clearwater beach we are now headed to brandy's house to pick up max, brandy, and john. now we can see the objects clearly. they were floating triangles. they had descended onto north clearwater and were now dispersing in all directions. the closest one was about 0.5 miles due east flying at 500-800 ft silently. it was an easily discernible triangle shape and it was wobbling as it floated. each tip was illuminated with intensely bright yellow lights and a red light in the middle. each light was flashing at separate intervals. the flash would create an intense glow around each corner. the middle red light would also become brilliantly bright. there were 2 other exact triangles in our immediate vicinity. we arrive at brandy's house.

9:50 max, brandy, and john tell us they can see the triangles at brandy's house. now collectively there is me, lucas, justin, max, brandy, and john. there is not enough room in lucas's truck so i had to sit in the trunk (which i kinda wanted to do anyway so i could see the sky). we proceed south towards largo. as we drove i could see the triangles every few minutes dipping around. as i am staring at one of the triangles hovering the car stops because we thought there was a big triangle approaching from the north. it actually turned out to be a 757 flying low. we laughed at the irony, but as we laughed i noticed that the triangle i had been staring at disappeared as the 757 arrived. 

10:00 we continue south and arrive at a duncan donuts in largo. a few minutes after we arrive we spy a ufo headed east to west with a triangle formation of light on a bigger scale. it was about 150 long and was enormous. it was bigger than the 757 and made no sound as it floated slowly. we could see how thin the triangle was and were becoming frantic. 


10:30 we head back north towards dunedin to john's house. halfway up there are twin white lights headed towards us from the north. the craft was enormous and the tip was pointed south. the strange thing was is that it was floating east slowly without turning. as we drove directly under it we can see a complex light pattern with up to 10 lights. i can see the design of the craft and it looks similar to an sr-71 blackbird, or the the ship that the x-men used in the movies. it was silent and stopped. the tip suddenly turned east and it rapidly accelerated towards tampa. we then arrive at john's house.

11:30 all of us had been chilling for awhile at john's house outside and i was still pretty excited about all the crazy things i saw so i looked towards the northern sky to see if anything was there.  immediately i see a classic dark grey disc hovering and rotating about 100 ft directly above dunedin high school, the school i graduated from.  i pointed it out to my friends and then it started moving.  it flitted down and to the right really fast, and then quickly back up to the top right a little bit.  it kept flitting around in the same general vicinty and every once in a while a faint blue light would turn on and spin around with the disc.  from just seeing a few minutes of this event we are all wiggin out so we run out into the street to meet up with the ufo.  as we approach the saucer it's movements become more erractic and then it zooms off out of view in an instant.  we returned to john's house and didn't see anything else the rest of the night.

some conclusions that i can draw from these sightings is that there's alot of crazy shit flying around here right now and i've noticed that ufo sightings have exploded around the world in the past few months.  what i can concur is that either the governments around the world have invented and distributed super technology and have not released it to the public, or aliens are starting to make contact and have given the technology to the us government.  it just freaks me out that i don't know if what's flying around is human or alien beings.  i don't know how a human would be able to fly the disc i saw because it accelerated away so fast that the g forces would probably crush our heart.  i'm guessing that the triangles are human aicraft because they just love chilling around macdill airforce base, but i'm sure that some of the rainbow and orange spheres, discs, and star like ufos i've seen are celestial beings.  i hope they make contact soon because i want to have a space ship of my own and escape this planet with my friends and family!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Multiple ufo sighting in 1 day! floating triangles and a rotating disc

content.detailedDescription: It was in july at about 11:00 pm when my son and i were standng in our driveway looking at the stars. there were no clouds in the ski so you could see the stars very well that night. we stood there for a few minuets looking south skiward when i noticed what appeared to be a satellite travling northward towards us. it reached right over head and then made a sharp turn towards the west and shot off very fast. i can only describe the speed as like a shooting star. i don't know of any satellite that can do that. if anyone has seen a satellite at night it just looks like a star moving across the ski so you can emagine what this looked like.
content.summary: Watched what appeared to be a satellite crossing the ski.

content.detailedDescription: It was around 8:45pm when i took my kids outside to go swimming. i wasn't really in the mood but my kids were getting upset so my sister sid shed go sit outside with me so that they could swim. so we were sitting around the pool watching the kiddos and just talking about her upcoming wedding. i would look at her and then the kids. well when i was watching my kids i turned to talk to my sister and for some unknown reason i looked up to the side of me. there above one of the trees was a ufo hovering. it was orange on the bottom and blue on top. i know it sounds strange but it just looked like one of the ones always portrayed in movies. i didn't feel scared or anything but i kept staring at it for another 2 seconds which is really weird because i am your typical scardey cat. i do not like hearing or thinking of anything that could be defined an super natural.  i had a feeling that it saw me watching so it finally took off and darted behind some trees and i lost sight of it. it actually made no sounds and was silent. i just told my sister "i just saw a ufo". she was like "your kidding" and asked me questions over and over. i wish she had seen it and not me because that type of stuff really interest her. i wish i had said something right when i saw it so she would have seen it to but i guess i was just confused as to what was happening. after seeing it maybe 5 minutes later there were about 3 planes flying low in the area. there is an airport near but at this time never are they that close or so many in such a short time period.
content.summary: Was above the trees. it was hovering and then shot off.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside in my backyard when suddenly and quiet unexpected there was a definite feeling of something of size and super fast speed passing overhead; this took me a second or two to realize there had just been something as stated, there was no rushing of wind, no movement of trees however my dog reacted also with some degree of delay (a second or two after the thing has passed by) and began barking and circling while looking to my roof.  something unidentified just happened, certainly no airplane, it didn't feel like that at all.  i had this vague feeling of this something being round and flat yet i did not see anything -- i felt it pass overhead as stated.  tremendous speed.
content.summary: Something of tremendous speed passed over head

content.detailedDescription:
I was a boy..60 now..We were camping at glen allen park near marmora ontario..Not far from toronto canada..We moved west in 59 so its right on year wise..
the craft just drifted into view..Hung over the camp grounds for about a half hour moving very slowly around a bit but not getting too far from its original place..
was all black underneath..No lights..Just a dark triangular shape..Quiet..
left at a slightly accelerated pace when it flew off.. was about 150 ft to a side..
it was seen by many campers and was discussed by adults for a few days after and maw still talks of it and was quite disturbed by it all but..Equally excited as she saved ufo clipping for years before..
my dad was flight sargeant in rcaf at the time.. trenton..
i unfortunately was in bed sound asleep..I ve heard this story so often i feel like i have seen it myself.. but didn't..
shes still here and can corroborate herself..
shes 82..
my sighting was in yukon territory about 100 miles down yukon river toward st michael ak..
what thought were 2 satellites orbiting earth one lovely clear night..
aproached each other directly over head..Not so unusual..
except that when there were almost ..Seeming to crash into each other they each vered off at 90* angel to each other and carried on..So travelled 180* opposing away..Didn't see them again ever..They were fast moving..Faster than satellites..High..Them not me..;-)
dissappeared in the distance not the shadow of earth as satellites do..Just struck off away from each other and disappeared into dark of space..Satellites dissappear in shadow.. these kept going.. straight lines..Dimmed and gone..To high to see shape just bright light..
satellite dissappear much sooner.. these went way off..Straight lined and saw them for some time then just twinkled out..Got smaller and smaller..
thats it..4 5 minute to vanish..
oh..
i saw 5 objects at cfb cold lake years later while at 42 radar squadron radar tower.. working for civil engineers..
was standing behind an operator.. when 5 objects come on screen..
operator asked officer in charge if he should clear the tower.. he said no..
we can deny later..Truth i say..;-)
well these 5 objects were tracked at 40000 mph.. cf 104's were scrambled and gave chase..When they were 5 miles from objects thats when they shot off in a blink.. gone...Jets couldnt get close..
thats it too..
then they told us that if we speak of it they will simply deny it and hoped we realised how lucky we were to have witnessed this for our experience with the ufo thing..
that was around 1963..Maybe 62..Yes i was 15 when i went to work on the base..Lived in pmq's with mother and father..He was then flight sargeant..Senior nco snag and recovery..Hangar 9
military nepotism..;-)
cant recall ever seeing anything like that radar image..5 distinct objects..
in diamond formation.. all kept their formation..Left in a blink in perfect harmony..They were triangular as well..
there was no brevity on anyones part..The officer later said they cleared the tower of civilians when this happened as a rule.. we got lucky.. and i am very grateful to have wintessed this first hand..So.. all these years and i remember this some times..When i hear things like ufo's are figments..Ha..
denial is alive and well on planet earth. peace. if i have given too much persoanl info you can delete it..Im usually upfront and not shy to say whats on my mind..
thanks for this..Its been a long time and it feels good to let it go..
content.summary: Same triangular craft described by contributor that flashed.

content.detailedDescription: I had purchased my self a new camera a ( olympus sp-570 uz 10 megapixcel) not the best camera for the job i'm sure but i had gotten myself interested in ufos and i would go out and look at the clouds and sky more often and take pictures extending my lens into the sky and i took lots of pic's and this one i found most interesting. it gets more detailed once downloaded on a pc then download to a software program where you can zoom into it more.I do not what this is.  i welcome any comments.  through mufon i am known as "schurle"
content.summary: Paths for ufos or maybe a spiderweb or?

content.detailedDescription:
I was out mowing some grass on a tractor and had just finished when i saw an very bright object moving at a high rate of speed.  it was so bright it drew my attention right to it.  it was moving faster then any air plain i have ever seen. about half way across the sky it just stop and hung there about 15 to 20 seconds.  then it just was not there.
i have seen f4 phantoms traveling at supersonic speeds and this was moving more then twice that speed.  it made no sound, i was waiting for the sound to catch up and waited for the sonic boom, it never happened. i do not know how anything can be moving that fast and then just stop.    

points:
1. working on our farm
2. it was a bright as a arc welder, white light not blue 
3. a missile or military jet  
4. thin silver tube shape
5. just sat there on my tractor and watched it, my feeling was you don't see     that every day.
6. it just disappeared on its own while i was looking right at it.
content.summary: Saw fast moving object suddenly stop and then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: What was seen was a fireball shape glare with no after math or sound what so ever and the object was moving very slowly it has been spotted more then just once my mother bonnie lee wright and 8 other wittiness had seen the thing fly right over there head at her job and when she came home she had drawn the object on paper! it also changed form from a ball shape to a long shape cigar please if anyone else seen this same object let's bring it in to the light    if you need to contact bonnie wright  her email address is bonnie5673@msn.Com thank you
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.shape: Cigar,  Circle,  Fireball,  Flash,  Star-like,  Unknown
content.summary: Ufo spotted over shamokin, pennsylvania 6/25/2008

content.detailedDescription:
On the night of the 16th, june, i was over my girlfriends house. she lives in  east williamsburg, border with bushwick. it was her last night over and her subletter came so we took her to the roof of the apartment, to show her a perk to the place. while there a bright light, like headlights from an oncoming jet, was shining in our direction. all three of us looked at it in curiousity. the light was slowly sinking and eventually it blinked out. 5 minutes later i looked back in the direction the first light came from, and saw it again. the light seemed to me like it was over the east river, adjacent to the empire state building meaning 34th street.

i watched the second object, noticing that it was again slowly sinking, only suddenly without realize it'd restart again at it's top point (i could not notice this as it happened rather instantly). i then scanned the skies thinking perhaps there are more of these ufo's around. what i noticed instead were about half a dozen helicopters, all seeming to converge in the vacinity of the single object that originally caught my attention. the object it self, as i said, looked like the headlights of an oncoming jet. 

as the helicopters drew near, all but one of them turned about. the one that remained began to do circles around the object. i was astonished, and ultra curious as to what was going on. on it's third or fourth pass around the light source there was a laser, or some sort of flash, coming from the original light source onto the circling helicopter. the helicopter flashed and then began to flicker, motionless in the sky. my girlfriend thought the helicopter was on fire with the way it was flickering. as the helicopter never fell and crashed i assumed it was attempting some sort of light communication with the light source. after about 10 minutes of the flickering helicoptor the original light source seemed to expand in size and then break apart into three smaller light sources. all three were equal size to the original one. soon after this display all the lights blipped out, except for the flickering helicopter. the flickering on the helicopter continued for a few minutes while i observed the other 5 helicopters return to the location. once all together the flickering stopped and the 6 copters seemed to scower the area looking for something they had lost, and eventually my girlfriend lost interest and asked me to come inside. i oblidged. 

before coming in i scowered the sky one last time, and noticed a similar light far south over what seemed to be coney island, or manhattan beach. i didn't stick around to watch it however.

any other reports of a similar sighting around the same time/area?

i'd like to point out, as this mufon report is a couple weeks after the sighting, that the times i gave with this report are not very accurate. 
i do believe it was around 1:30-2:30am.


below was my ats report, which will follow with a link to the thread.

"last night i saw something in the sky that i couldn't identify, thusly i believe it to be a ufo. i was at my girlfriends house in bushwick, hanging out on her roof when suddenly my attention turned towards the city where i saw half a dozen helicopters, all seeming to converge in a single direction. i correlated the direction they were flying too but saw nothing. i began pacing back and forth and then boom i saw some very bright yellow/orange light hovering, almost gliding over the east river around 34th street. this light was very uniformed and slowly sinking until eventually it blipped out. in it's place a second light appeared, brighter and bigger, swaying ever so slightly left and right. the helicopters came close to the light source, and suddenly all but one turned around. the one remaining moved ever closer. after doing a 360 around the light source it erupted in flickering light. my girlfriend said it was on fire, but the helicopter looked more like it was putting on a light show, perhaps trying to communicate with the light source with patterns of light. after about 10 minutes the light source the helicopters were converging onto expanded in size, looked to me like it split into three light sources, and then blipped out. the flashing helicopter started flying back and forth as it's helicopter buddies returned and then seemed to scavenge the area. after 5 minutes of making circles around each other the flashing helicopter turned off the light show it was giving and flew off with the other copters. i noticed a similar light to the one i saw over the east river far off in the south, what looked like it could have been over coney island, or manhattan beach."

http://www.Abovetopsecret.Com/forum/thread364095/pg1'
content.summary: I saw a ufo over east river from williamsburg being tracked by helicopters

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way home when i took notcie to one star...It seemed to be moving so i pulled over to the side of the road and watched it move side to side then shot to the right stood still and then went out...I kept watching and it reapeared in the same area in which it went out and then "shut off again" i stayed there for about 15 mins waiting to see if i could see it aain to no avail.  indiana seems to be having a lot of these lately!
content.summary: I was on my way home when i took notice to one star

content.detailedDescription:
I just got off work and was driving down the road. i came up to a 4 way stop and seen this rise up from behind the trees. the reason i didn't get the video before i seen this cause i was in shock. i didn't know what it was i was just mesmerized by it. then it dawned on me to grab my cell phone (lg env) and record the object. the sound at the end of the video was a car that was passing me cause i stopped in the middle of the road and got out of my car.

this took place around 11:25pm and 11:28pm est. i was in saginaw michigan and i was coming from deplhi stearing gear where i work.

http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=ghh1vdoa8l4
content.summary: Looked like an orange orb. bright orange glow to it

content.detailedDescription:
We are a professional video production company based in tenerife off the west coast of africa.  

while editing some footage we filmed of the scenery around a property that we doing some short promotional footage for i noticed a blimp appear on the screen for a frame.

on closer inspection it appears first on the left hand side of the screen, then dead centre, then on the right hand side of the screen.  moving so fast that it takes up only 2 frames of capture.  when viewed slowly, both the far corner blips seem to snap into view while the centre one fades in and fades out and there does not seem to be any natural progression from one to the other, although it is moving so fast it might be that the camera just didnt capture it.

it could also just be a glitch in the camera/tape/capture.
content.summary: Shape that zips across the top of the screen in a fraction of a second

content.detailedDescription:
I went for a motorcycle ride headed towards hot sulpher springs near winterpark, co.  to avoid the rain i took a county road 55 or cottonwood pass.  i noticed a dead cow and decided to investigate.  what i found seems to be a classical mutilation case with anus cored, utters clipped, jaw portion removed and looks like it was cauterized.  i should mention that the farmer thought that the cow had been dead no more than 48 hours or less, she didn't know how the 2 triangle marks could have been made in front of the utter.  she also thought that the cow was pregnant and was puzzled that the animal had not been scavenged much.

i took some pics, left the site, then came back and took more pics when the sheriff showed up to make a report.  after i was leaving about 8pm went by the animal again.  i was looking at the sky as it was raining in the direction i was heading.  then i saw a shooting star, very bright, very close and with an explosion at the end...  very strange night.
content.summary: Witness on motorcycle ride through mountains sees dead cow in mountain grazing land, stops to investigate

content.detailedDescription:
I was watching the television programme "yesterday at wimbledon" on channel bbc2.

tv presenter john inverdale was interviewing tennis celebrity john mcenroe, both men were sitting down facing one another.

when the camera viewed them both from the side a glowing object could be seen in the sky over john mcenroe, some distance way.  the camera operator viewed the object twice, but; the third time the camera viewed the men; the camera operator had zooomed in to avoid filming the object.  which indicates that the camera operator was aware of the ufo.

the object appeared to be hovering.  i thought the object was maybe a helicopter.
content.summary: Ufo over wimbledon tennis 2008

content.detailedDescription: I was on a swiss air flight from  zurich to boston. it was around 6-6:15 pm (est),thursday june 19th, 2008.  the plane was over the atlantic about 45 minutes or so from crossing newfoundland (i know that because i was watching the map monitor in the front of the plane's cabin which displayed where the plane was). above i say massachusetts and the u.S. because i had to put something in order to send this (and of course it was neither). it was, as stated above, over the atlantic. off to the left, ahead of the plane and considerably below was a very bright white light.  at first i wondered what it might be, and when i realized that we were nowhere near land my curiosity picked up.  it seemed too  big for a ship (considering the plane's altitude) and there was too much light for a ship to display (especially given that there was still a fair amount of daylight out there).  it did'nt seem to be moving, and eventually we passed it, and looking out the window and this time behind the plane i could still see it. it still shone with that very bright white light, and the shape seemed a little clearer (kind of like a pyramid except that the tip was not centered but significantly to the right).  i assumed it wasn't moving, so i figured it wasn't a ufo or something (i have never before seen one, and it certainly wasn't another plane.)  i wondered if it wasn't a big iceberg catching the sun's rays.  a couple of days later i saw the story, with pictures, about the sightings in england. the shape of the ufo in one of the photos was exactly like i had seen, and the light was also white!  then i began to think about what i saw and it occurred to me that it was highly unlikely that it was an iceberg catching the light of the fading sun.  to be specific, the light was the same (white and intense) when i looked at it ahead of the plane (to the west) and when i looked at it behind the plane (to the east). the sun was starting to set in the east, so how could it so brightly illuminate it as i observed it both to the west (ahead of the plane) and to the east (behind the plane).  that didn't seem to make any sense.  also (though i don't know for sure), it might have been moving.  it didn't seem so to me, but the plane was probably flying at about 500 mph, and an object moving -- but at a much slower speed (say 50 or 100 mph?) -- wouldn't necessarily appear to be moving. in any event, a very curious sighting (especially given all the events and photos happening just a few days later over england). unfortunately, i didn't have a camera, so i didn't take any pictures.
content.summary: I was on a flight back from europe and saw a strange light out the plane's window.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my front porch in a conversation when i witnessed in the northen sky a large bright, round, flash of light that glowed in orange, red and yellow, which dissapated and flew off in a streak of the same colors towards the western sky in a 45 degree angle at a high rate of speed. upon first spotting the object i was concerned that there had been an explosion, then when it streaked through the sky and was not accompinied by any sounds i realized my initial thought had been wrong and that i may have just spotted a u.F.O. and was left with a feeling of awe. i wished i could have seen more of it but that was impossible because of the speed in which it traveled.
content.summary: An explosion of light

content.detailedDescription:
It was sometime in 1980 and my cousin and i were in her room watching tv.  i was 16 yrs old and she about 15.  as i recall, it was about 1am.  her room was on the first floor at the front of the house.  i was sitting on the bed & she was in a chair to my right with her back to the window.  i looked over at her in conversation and a bright orange light outside the window caught my attention ��� i don���t recall any curtains or shades on the window so my view was clear.  i said ���look��� & ran to the window.  she followed & we just stood there in silence and watched a craft lifting off from the front yard.  i didn���t see the top or sides of it, only the underside.  it was larger than a car but smaller than a house, rectangular in shape and the underside was just an indescribable mass of flashing lights and tubes and completely bright, neon orange in color.  it was completely silent and slowly lifted up over the house and then was gone from our line of vision. we immediately ran out the front door and looked around but it was gone.

the whole sighting lasted for probably under a minute but i can still see it in my mind���s eye perfectly like it happened yesterday.  i never felt any fear, just completely amazed and excited.  we knew what it wasn���t (plane, helicopter, blimp, etc.) but i don���t remember the word ���ufo��� really entering my mind, though i think we both knew deep down it was the real thing.  at that time ufos weren���t really something i thought about or knew anything about.  i wish now we had searched the front lawn for evidence of a landing sight, or knocked on the neighbor���s doors to ask if they saw it, but that just never occurred to us at the time.

we woke her parents who i think were a bit doubtful, but believed us to a certain extent because we were so adamant about what we saw.  nobody knew what to do so we called the local airport (dulles int���l) & asked if there had been any other reports of strange flying crafts & were told no.  so after that, and for the next 25+ years, i pretty much didn���t think about it.  anytime i mentioned it people would just laugh and roll their eyes so it was just easier to ignore the whole experience.  however lately, the last 6-12 months, i have found myself thinking about this experience daily, almost compulsively.  i���ve felt the need to research and do as much reading on the subject of ufos to try and understand what i experienced which has also led to me filing this report.  

one other interesting thing to note is during this same time frame (my late teens, early 20���s) i did have a few experiences of waking up in the middle of the night in a state of paralysis, unable to move but mentally awake.  i also developed at that time what i considered a completely irrational fear of the dark and would watch tv (in my room) as late as possible trying to stay awake and then eventually sleep with the light on.  i was way too embarrassed to ever mention this to anyone and i never associated it with the ufo sighting.  however, now that i���ve been reading about visitation/abduction experiences i���m wondering if there was a connection.
content.summary: Witnessed craft lift off from front yard and fly over house

content.detailedDescription: On the way out of my house , my cousin and i saw what was appearded to be two lights  one red one blue an they seemed to be a bout 400ft apart  and hovering then they switched  sides twice an converged in the middle  were there appered a third light  a  clear or white one . i stoped the vehicle an left the car and my cousin alone in the car to walk an get a third wittness my inteiour flashed  on and then the lights went crazy moving  erraticly in the same general area..Slowly they all moved towards the middle then they  all went out..A strange thing i had a 3 day old fire smouldering back there ..An when the two outside lights lined up they wqere always directly over the embers from our line of sight as we were walking up on them ,at 300ft away they dissappeared from behind the embered log . this is the second time in 4 months exact spot..I plan on moving bsck there on the bluff as most of my savings are on that land..So how do i greet my new neighbors
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw two lights one blue one red and two white ones centered bettween the 400ft. span

content.detailedDescription: I was heading home from work on rt 16 heading in the direction of hanover. just outside of newark where it became wooded along the highway, i looked to the right and saw a craft hovering right above the trees. at the time i wouldn't have been able to describe it but now that i have studied the subject a little i know that it looked like the type of craft that george adamski reported seeing (the kind that sceptics say are some type of chicken incubator light). there was a turret like thing on top with round windows around it. there was light coming from the windows and you could see it shining on the lower part of the body. it was absolutely silent. since i was alone i was afraid to stop but i watched for as long as i could in my rear view mirror and it never moved.
content.summary: Adamski type craft hovering over the trees

content.detailedDescription: Early sunday morning aroung 12- am my family and i were sitting in our back yard, we were having a family gathering earlier that evening and the conversation of weird ufo dreams came up between my brother javier and i. we were looking at the skies that night and spotted three different ball of light moving through the skies at rapid speed, all three at different times throughout the night. closer to 1-am we saw a large ball of light come down and shoot through the sky; it looked to be near the 71fwy and 60fwy interchange- but in reality it may have been some where other. that was a cool night- it got me excited and wanting to see more...
content.summary: Fire ball in the sky shot down with rapid speed- chino, ca.

content.detailedDescription:
Not sure the exact time or day, i was about 15 years old when this happened.  i still remember it like it was yesterday...

i was over at a friends house just outside of ashley, oh when we noticed 3 lights in the sky.  stars were out, but these lights were much brighter than any star in the sky.  the formation they were in was a triangle shape and they seemed to be strobing lights back and forth as a form of communication.

they moved away from each other slowly, but kept the same formation.  then what seemed only an instant, they went in three different directions faster than my eyes could move and vanished over the horizon (north, west and south)

the next day my friends electricity didn't work.  his father called an electrician and the guy arrived w/in 15 mins... how often does that happen?

the electrician greeted us, asked for the fuse box and then started talking about aliens... it was off-putting since we had the sighting and did not mention to this fellow about it and he brings it up like its the talk of the town.

he spoke about aliens and sightings for probably 30 mins and neither my friend or i mentioned anything about the sighting. the most erie part was when he was about to leave, he looked at us with a strange grin and whispered to only my friend and i, "remember, they are only weather balloons... it's probably best to leave it at that".  

when the electrician left, my friends dad (who watched the lights with us) made a comment about how strange that was and how the guy didn't seem to do anything but flip a switch outside and his electric was back on.  

that is the only sighting i have witnessed.  if you lived around the same area and had the same sighting, please feel free to email me.  would be nice to discuss it further with someone who doesn't think i am crazy...
content.summary: 3 lights hover in sequence, then instantly take off in different directions

content.detailedDescription:
1.  taking pictures of "weird" cloud formations and lights in the night sky.
2.  the witness was downloading digital pictures into her laptop & saw the vortexes.
3.  vortexes.
4.  the vortexes were hovering in the sky.
5.  the witness had feelings of elation and obsession with watching the night sky due to several encounters/observations of "weird" clouds & lights plus black helicopters in the area.
6. the objects just moved away.
content.summary: 3 vortexes appeared in the sky while witness was observing "weird" cloud formations and lights in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: Driving home corner of my eye i saw what was a shooting star zoom by at really close altitude which opened my eyes to look around. go to a red light looked over and saw this object hovering around in the sky. secind time i have seen this in the same general area. after i saw it the light turned green i drove a few yards turned to look again and it was gone no where to be seen.
content.summary: 6 bright lights in shape of boomerang hovering over the former don poblos site

content.detailedDescription:
While going to work at dia, i was driving on 96th ave. and had just passed the entrance to the rocky mtn. arsenal. i saw a vehicle that i thought was a small plane that was going to land on the road. it was traveling west and i was going east. it came over the hill in front of me and i slowed down thinking it was landing, it passed over a car about 7/4 mile ahead of me.
i came to a stop and it began to move over the fields to my left(north).
it was about 200ft. up and just off the roadway. i turned off my radio
and rolled down my window. there was no sound. it was moving very slowly
(2 mph). after 5-10 seconds a truck passed the intersection for the arsenal.
i put my car in first and went on to work. when i got to the pena on-ramp
i looked back and it was still over the same area.

description- a large white globe type light near the front of the vehivle,
but on the left side. this light illuminated the area to about 10ft. all around it. i could see the left side and it looked metallic and gray in color. there were 2 more light on this side of the vehicle(both red).
about 30ft. to the right side(my left) there was another smaller white light. i couldn't see a wing on the left side(my right). it was maybe 25ft.
from nose to tail and maybe 30ft. from the red light on the left side to the smaller white light on the right. the red lights were blinking.

i've worked around all types of airplanes for 15 years. this was not any plane i have ever seen, and i don't think it was a helicopter because it made no noise.  while driving and thinking about it i came to the realization
that i did not have any idea what i had just seen. 

this probably could have been seen from c tower at dia. certainly could have been on their radar.
content.summary: A vehicle 200ft. up, going slow, no sound, 4 lights

content.detailedDescription:
this is verbatum as told to me. while traveling south on route 209 we saw this very large bright white ball with clearly defined edges and no tail or trail dive straight down behind the mountains(i presume the shawangunk mtns....) the witnesses, a married couple that live in the area, said it was "the size of a tennis ball in your hand" in other words, pretty big. i have known these people for many years. they are pillars of the community and not prone to exageration or flights of fancy. they reported this to me only after i had e-mailed them of my sighting on the morning of 6/10/08 east of rhinebeck.

                                                      sincerely, rjw
                                                      pres.  ufosa
content.summary: clearly defined bright white ball moving very quickly straight down behind mountains.

content.detailedDescription:
For the second time we've experienced unusual power surges and electrical problems in our home ( a/c unit shorts out and catches fire after repair, computer went to blue screen of death but recovered) it was suggested to me to go outside and take pictures when these things occur. so i did. i've enclosed both photos. none of these things were visible to my eye at the time the photo's were taken. we live on top of a small ridge and are surrounded by heavy woods then farm land into the rolling hills. we are located 10 miles from the nearest small town.  these photo's were taken at the top of the ridge where my pole barn and horse pasture is located. i have a pretty clear view of the sky with the tree line evident.  other people in our area have experienced strange electrical problems according to the repair man, who has been busy fixing the problems.

these pictures were taken with a fujifilm finepix s700 digital camera on auto setting. 




i did write up the first repost and have photo's of that experience as well. being that this is the second time in a month that this is happeded i thought i'd better just go ahead and file it. i would be happy to submit it if you folks think i should.

my son witnessed the downloading of the pictures i filed today, so i am including him. we have both experienced intense crackling in the phone when we pick it up to use and to dial. i've had calls come in from my own phone number.
content.summary: 2  photos taken after electrical issues in home

content.detailedDescription: I was watching a ship going in and out of brookings harbor on there web cam. then on one frame i seen what look to me to be a ufo. the next time the cam refreshed itself the object was gone.
content.summary: This was on the brookings habor web cam.

content.detailedDescription: About 11:40 am, on a clear blue sky beautifull day, i and 2-3 three other people noticed a bright star/venus like object moving slowly(30-50mph) due north to due south. very brightly reflecting the sun, or ceating it's own light. if i squinted, i was barely able to make out a silver cigar like body, very hard to see with the glare. altitude was about 10 thousand feet. i've never seen anything like it. i have an aviation background, so i'm familiar with aircraft. i was in the military for 10 years, as a flight operation specialist( atc). eventually(20 min) it got about 5 miles away, and was still brightly visable lower on the horizon. as i watched, it made some sudden turns, and sped away at a rate that i can barely explain. almost like going to warp drive. that is a crude referance, but that is the closest i can come to describing it. i have 20/20 or better vision, and i don't require glasses. i thought it may have been a drone aircraft at first, but why was it where it was, and the performance that it had when it left, was beyone what i know that unmanned drones can do. i is literally the first time that i saw something in the clear blue sky, that i could not identify. i also had 3 other witnesses. i believe one other was as intrigued as myself. the other 2 thought it may have been a helicopter. but it was too high and just did not fit was a copter sounds like or looks like. i have a helocopter aviation background, and i very familiar with them.
content.summary: Bright slow moving venus like object. midday. clear blue sky. silent, about 10-15 thousand feet up

content.detailedDescription:
I and my girlfriend were sitting at an improvised beach on the shore of sredneuralsk water reserve basin. we were not under effect of any alcohol or drugs. we only had mango juice and mineral water with us to drink. it was evening but the sun still shined hot. on the sky there were 2 layers of clouds, both rather sparse. there were several low placed, typical pillow style, dense clouds, and way higher above these, at about the height jet planes fly, there were the feathery thin, fine, semi-transparent clouds.

ironically, it was my habit of drinking *all* the fruit juice from the box that made me discover the ufo in the first place. i raised my eyes to the zenith while putting the juice box to my mouth. at first i noticed some tiny flies going chaotically about 30 to 80 cm above our heads. and then, looking through the gathering of flies, i noticed the ufo. it was a very small, wing-shaped (german ww2 era fw-190 fighter wing shape comes to mind as a close match) body that reflected solar light as if it was made of metal. at first split second i mistook it for a gleam of reflected light produced by my glasses, but it moved independently from the movements of my head. my next thought was that it's a small, sunlit spider borne by wind on a piece of its web (the wind close the ground was directed that way, roughly in the direction of the sun). but i looked harder, and the sharp lines of the ufo, perceived distance to it and its determined behavior made it clear to me that it was not any living creature i could compare it against.

the ufo was traveling unnaturally fast for a plane, much less a helicopter. it produced no audible sounds. it changed its course slightly and abruptly, making a zigzag shaped trajectory (whereas man-made airplanes change course in a curve, and helicopters have to slow down before changing course at a geometrically precise angle; this ufo just went a different course without warning). i tried to show the ufo to my girlfriend (unlike me, she has perfect vision), but it was just too small and too fast moving. in less than 10 seconds i could no longer see it because it went under the high, thin cloud that was lit by the sun, making the ufo invisible on its background.

my girlfriend was extremely interested in the ufo, so she began purposely staring in that region of the sky. in about 3 or 5 minutes, she noticed it again, because it came back and stopped, hovering up there at a height of several kilometers (we both coincided on such height estimate; the ufo was located in between the two layers of clouds).

within 15 or 20 seconds she explained to me where to look at to see the ufo, and i too was now able to see it. the ufo hovered in place. it looked like a cigar made of metal, orientated horizontally. it was making turns about the vertical axis, as if sniffing for something or looking around. the sun was to the right of it and slightly higher. when it turned to us its right side, we could see it reflect the sunlight. when it turned left side, we could see it as a dark shape, as if the object was opaque. when it turned away from us, we could not see it, as if it was thin in cross section.

after about a minute of hovering, the ufo took off abruptly and flew away, disappearing over the background of clouds just like it did before.

our feelings were nothing beyond the expected. we are not ufo seekers, meaning that we don't take active interest in paranormal phenomena. because of not being accustomed to seeing this stuff, we were thoroughly interested and happy from the fact that we finally saw a real ufo. we did not perceive  our feelings or anything to be externally, explicitly manipulated by the ufo presence.

all the other people on the beach were too busy with themselves (in their usual routine of drinking and cursing) to notice anything so sublime. besides, they are the kind of people that seldom look at the sky at all.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Hard, opaque, metallic shining, fast moving and stationary, zigzag flight, no perceptible accelerations, distant, hard to discover by eye
